overview: June 19th, 2000. This video is dedicated to the principles behind the Rock Against Racism movement. Show was free and exclusive to BowieNet Subscribers. Attended by Iman Jones, Susan Sarandon, a few members of The Cure, and was directed by Zowie Bowie (or Duncan Jones). Dennis Davis joined the backing band for 2 songs and Thomas Dolby for 1.
title: David Bowie: Roseland Ballroom, NYC
